statements: DELETE FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 AND rating > 3;
DELETE FROM Feedback WHERE id = 1 AND rating > 3
DELETE FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_text LIKE '%positive%'
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'OPEN' AND issue_description LIKE '%critical%';

DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed' AND ticket_open_date < '2022-01-01';
